products.name: Bologna SP European Oak Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Bologna SPpromises an economical choice for straight plank within our Rustic grade selection and we assure you that it will give a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its classic European White Oak color and style combination. This distinctive wood floor is cured with layers of UV Oil to achieve both natural feel and look while maintaining excellent protection. Together with wire brushing and finish treatments, these floors boast an elegant texture while keeping a sleek presentation. For optimal care and longevity, we recommend usingWOCAor BONA hardwood floor products.

products.name: Foscari Natural/Rustic Engineered Hardwood Flooring
products.description: Foscaripromises an economical choice within our wide planked Rustic select grade selection and is guaranteed to add a modern feel to your current or upcoming renovation with its natural vintage color and style combination. This particular wood floor is finished with thin layers of Oil to achieve certain finish specialties like leveling, protection together with gloss and it is also wire brushed for the benefit of fine texture while maintaining a smooth appearance.

This particular wood floor is finished with thin layers of Oil or UV Lacquer to achieve certain finish specialties like leveling, protection together with gloss and it is also wire brushed for the benefit of fine texture while maintaining a smooth appearance.

details.finish: Matte UV Urethane Aluminum Oxide Finish
